name: Knight Fight (Knight Fight)
description: Indeed using weapons but also different techniques the two opponents will compete not on horses as tradition dictates, but indeed on pigs! You will thus have to cross several rooms of the castle in order to enter the last room of it which is outside for the fight final. But beware, at the start of the game you will have the choice between 4 different characters from the middle ages and you may find yourself facing players tough who will also want your place.
